title: [Volunteer Ocean Week] Finding Fellow Homeguards to Play With
body:
# Greetings Summoners!

_This is just one of the events that we are running alongside Ocean Week, check out the [main post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/U5Bjv4Tz) for more information_

http://i.imgur.com/iYhgcBp.jpg

# Want to find fellow Summoners to play with? We have you covered.

Ocean Week is all about playing games to get as many points as possible to help defend Oceania, and the most fun way to do that is with friends. If you are looking for people to play with we have set up a discord server for you to join to find fellow Summoners.

[**Here's the discord invite link!**](https://discord.gg/GP8JK7N)

---

The discord server is broken up into 4 different chat channels for each of the maps, along with 1 channel #general for discussion. If you are looking to find a group to play with, post in the channel that is for the map that you want to play. The channels are:

Summoner's-Rift-NORMS
Summoner's-Rift-RANKED-FLEX
Howling-Abyss-ARAM
Twisted-Treeline

You can choose to either send a message into these chat rooms or invite people that are posting, it is up to you. Use this as a template for the message to send into the chat to make everything as seamless as possible, and to help you find a group as fast as possible.

> Summoner Name: 
> Preferred Roles: 
 Rank: 

_I would only recommend using ranked information if you are posting in the ranked channel for Summoners Rift games._

---

We sadly however must have some rules in place before you go posting, and the rules in the discord are as follows:

1. No spamming, once you state your information only do it once and wait for an invite
2. Adhere to the boards Universal Rules 
3. The 4 invite channels are for the information using the template provided only, if you would like to have a chat about Ocean Week or have any questions, talk in the #general chat.
---

If you have any questions feel free to ask them in the general chat in discord or ask them down below in the comments. 

Good luck in your games and have a fun Ocean Week!
